text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: Well, if it isn't the Emperor! I see you've decided to grace us foolish commoners with your presence.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Please don't act so standoffish. I'll be leaving as soon as I get my point across. I have a favor to ask of you from the student council.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: A favor?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I'll cut to the chase. I want you to ask the girls around you to attend the Ligne Droite.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Students suggested it to us, and so this year, we've decided to incorporate a DJ into the dance. The letter we received gave the name of a composer… who we've since invited to appear at the party.

text_block_list.name: Sirius's Groupie A
text_block_list.text: Oh…!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: In doing so, I think that… we can face the upcoming year more lively than the last. Naturally, I won't force you, but I can promise there will be plenty to gain for you.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Their futures are bright. I only want to bless all the students on their journeys and wish them luck. Doing everything in my power to organize this, I want it to become a milestone for them, to give them that push forward.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: Ah, of course! I'm touched, how kind of you to lower the hurdles… …for an underachiever who's unable to keep up!

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: Maybe if you get on your knees for the big shot on monkey mountain, they'll feel better and bring all their little pals with them?

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: Don't make me laugh. Go act out of ego, but don't drag other people into it.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: What do you mean by that?

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: Ha, do I need to spell it out for you? "Celebrating the upcoming year" is all well and good, but you're just imposing that on everyone. And you think that's gonna make people happy?

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: You want to give them your blessing? A push forward? No, you just want to feel like you did a good thing. If that isn't ego, I don't know what is.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: I'm sure you only wanted to share the good news, But open your eyes, Rudolf. You're self-centered. This is all because of your arrogance!

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: Ha. Get it now? Go home. I'm not riding on your damn ark. But if you want it that bad, why don't you grab a cue?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Let me borrow that for a moment.

text_block_list.name: Sirius's Groupie A
text_block_list.text: Huh? …Oh, okay.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Hmph…!

text_block_list.name: Sirius's Groupie A
text_block_list.text: Woah, that jump shot was crazy. And her reflexes are so sharp…

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Sirius, have you forgotten? You taught me that trick after I begged you. Will I never be able to match up to the version of myself in your memories?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I take back what I said. Your help isn't necessary. If you're not interested, there's nothing I can do. I'll just have to make a stronger announcement. I'm sorry to have interrupted, goodbye.

text_block_list.name: Sirius's Groupie A
text_block_list.text: Wow, the student council's pretty scary… Though, what'd she mean by memories?

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: That's not like her…

text_block_list.name: Sirius's Groupie A
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: Thing is, unfortunately… I've known her for a pretty long time. Enough of that. Are you guys going to the Droite? Spit it out, I want to hear the truth.

text_block_list.name: Sirius's Groupie A
text_block_list.text: Nah… I'm thinking I'll bail this year. I'd feel awkward, 'cause… I don't exactly have the grades to be wearing a dress, do I?

text_block_list.name: Sirius's Groupie A
text_block_list.text: Y-Yeah… That's it. A DJ's not gonna change anything, right?
A few days later—

text_block_list.name: Horsegirls
text_block_list.text: —Kyaaaaaaaaa～～!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirls
text_block_list.text: You look gorgeous, Fuji-senpai!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Thank you, all of you. Now, where could she be…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: My date, I know you're here. Won't you come out and meet everyone?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: That looks fantastic on you! It's formal but still playful, so it fits you really well. This is so exciting.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: You really don't hesitate with compliments, do you?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: You're free to tell me whatever you think too! So tell me, how do I look in my dress?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: The spitting image of a goddess.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Our outfits are both ready to go, So relax and have a little fun! And don't forget about our trade.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: What do you mean, trade?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Well, you're stubborn, so I figured you wouldn't accept right away. But you're exactly the person I need.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Even if you set conditions, I'll have no choice but to force your hand. But if you play along… I'll reward you with whatever you like.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Whatever I like?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I'm the dorm mother, after all. If you don't have a quiet place to sleep, you can rest in my room. Or I can organize a mock race for you.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: How about… I can gather different generations of GI winners, or something! As long as what you want is reasonable, I can make it happen.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Why would you go that far for me, of all people? I'm not exactly exceptional at dancing, And as you can see, I've got zero motivation.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: You had plenty to say about the Trickster thing, But you must have some other reason to pick me, right?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I explained all of it. My only goal here is to make the Droite a success. And in order to do that, I need your help.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: No way, that can't be it. I know she's got some ulterior motive. But then again…
